channel.title: Posts on Entirely Different Matters
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Entirely Different Matters

item.title: Can't into Forestry
item.description: I found forestry so confusing to use. It’s one of those blocky websites that trade usability in the name of “accessible” user experience. A trend I’ve seen in a lot of modern websites. Hard pass. I’ll stick to Vim and bash scripts for now.

item.title: I've set up Forestry
item.description: I’m trying out Forestry, so that I don’t have to actually use Vim to write my posts like some basement dweller. So far, it seems straightforward but annoying to use if I want to do anything more than the bare minimum. In this case that’s a good thing. Anything that makes me write more and fuck around less.
